Success.Name: ExeSQL
Success.Value: SQL:UPDATE MST_SLSMAN_TXN SET DOWNLOAD_FLAG='D',DOWNLOAD_DT=dbo.GetCountryDate() WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#' AND DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

Condition.Name: con1
Condition.Value: MBL_RELHIST.COMP_CD=MBL_RELUSER.COMP_CD AND MBL_RELHIST.VER_NO=MBL_RELUSER.VER_NO AND MBL_RELHIST.REL_DT=MBL_RELUSER.REL_DT AND MBL_RELHIST.COMP_CD='#CompCD#' AND MBL_RELUSER.USER_CD='#UserCD#' AND MBL_RELUSER.DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P' AND 'DMS '+MBL_RELUSER.VER_NO!='#AppVer#' ORDER BY MBL_RELHIST.REL_DT DESC

Success.Name: success
Success.Value: SQL:UPDATE MBL_RELUSER SET MBL_RELUSER.DOWNLOAD_FLAG='D',MBL_RELUSER.DOWNLOAD_DT=dbo.GetCountryDate() WHERE MBL_RELUSER.COMP_CD='#CompCD#' AND MBL_RELUSER.VER_NO=(SELECT TOP 1 MBL_RELHIST.VER_NO FROM MBL_RELHIST,MBL_RELUSER WHERE MBL_RELHIST.COMP_CD=MBL_RELUSER.COMP_CD AND MBL_RELHIST.VER_NO=MBL_RELUSER.VER_NO AND MBL_RELHIST.REL_DT=MBL_RELUSER.REL_DT AND MBL_RELHIST.COMP_CD='#CompCD#' AND MBL_RELUSER.USER_CD='#UserCD#' ORDER BY MBL_RELHIST.REL_DT DESC) AND MBL_RELUSER.USER_CD='#UserCD#' AND MBL_RELUSER.DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

Condition.Name: condition
Condition.Value: DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#' AND REF_TYPE='H_RESETPWD' AND DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

Success.Name: ExeSQL
Success.Value: SQL:UPDATE MBL_SETUP SET DOWNLOAD_FLAG='D',DOWNLOAD_DT=dbo.GetCountryDate() WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#' AND REF_TYPE='H_RESETPWD' AND DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

Condition.Name: condition
Condition.Value: DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#' AND REF_TYPE='H_UNLOCK' AND DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

Success.Name: ExeSQL
Success.Value: SQL:UPDATE MBL_SETUP SET DOWNLOAD_FLAG='D',DOWNLOAD_DT=dbo.GetCountryDate() WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#' AND REF_TYPE='H_UNLOCK' AND DOWNLOAD_FLAG='P'

After.Name: MENU_1
